name: IntraMaps Roam
tagline: Simple and flexible data collection built using QGIS.
body:
IntraMaps Roam is a field, and office, data collection application built using the QGIS libraries and Python. It was built to be easy to use on (windows) based devices.

![](https://github.com/DMS-Aus/Roam/wiki/images/2.1-Release.png)

![](https://github.com/DMS-Aus/Roam/wiki/images/capture2.1.png)

See the [**wiki**](https://github.com/DMS-Aus/Roam/wiki) for information on how to create a project and user guides.

The latest release is [**V2.1 - Data Collection**](https://github.com/DMS-Aus/Roam/releases)

Newest features in 2.1 include:

- Polygon and line capture support
- Recapture geometry
- Drawing pad
- Camera (Windows only)
- GPS page
- Translation support
- API clean up and extras (access to GPS on forms etc)
- Legend page
- Attribute Help
- GPS Logging and tracking
- New `roam.api` module for public facing API.  Anything imported from this module will have stable API in 2.x releases.
- Loading projects from other folders

More details can be found on the [features page](https://github.com/DMS-Aus/Roam/wiki/Features-2.1) for the release.
